00056   void
00057   processOptions(const TMS_Data::ListJobsOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00058 
00059     //To check if the jobId is defined
00060     if (options->getJobId().size() != 0) {
00061       //To check if the jobIf exists
00062       checkJobId(options->getJobId());
00063       //To add the jobId on the request
00064       addOptionRequest("jobId", options->getJobId(), sqlRequest);
00065     }
00066 
00067     //To check if the number of cpu is defined and positive
00068     if (options->getNbCpu() > 0) {
00069       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00070       addOptionRequest("nbCpus", convertToString(options->getNbCpu()), sqlRequest);
00071     } else {
00072       //If the options is not the default value -1
00073       if (options->getNbCpu() != -1) {
00074         throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "The number of cpu is incorrect");
00075       }
00076     }
00077 
00078     time_t fromSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getFromSubmitDate());
00079     if(fromSubmitDate != -1) {
00080       fromSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(fromSubmitDate);
00081       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(fromSubmitDate));
00082       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00083     }
00084 
00085     time_t toSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getToSubmitDate());
00086     if(toSubmitDate != -1) {
00087       toSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(toSubmitDate); 
00088       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(toSubmitDate));
00089       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00090     }
00091 
00092     //To check the job status
00093     if (options->getStatus() != -1) {
00094       //To check the job status options
00095       checkJobStatus(options->getStatus());
00096       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00097       addOptionRequest("status", convertToString(options->getStatus()), sqlRequest);
00098     } else {
00099        if (options->getJobId().size() == 0) { 
00100          sqlRequest.append(" and status < 5 "); 
00101        } 
00102     }
00103 
00104     //To check the job priority
00105     if (options->getPriority() != -1) {
00106       //To check the job priority options
00107       checkJobPriority(options->getPriority());
00108       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00109       addOptionRequest("jobPrio", convertToString(options->getPriority()), sqlRequest);
00110     }
00111 
00112     if (options->getOwner().size() != 0) {
00113       addOptionRequest("owner", options->getOwner(), sqlRequest);
00114     }
00115 
00116     //To check if the queue is defined
00117     if (options->getQueue().size() != 0) {
00118       //To check if the queue exists
00119       checkQueueName(options->getQueue());
00120       //To add the jobId on the request
00121       addOptionRequest("jobQueue", options->getQueue(), sqlRequest);
00122     }
00123   }

00130   TMS_Data::ListJobs*
00131   list() {
00132     std::string sqlListOfJobs = "SELECT vsessionid, submitMachineId, submitMachineName, jobId, jobName, jobPath, errorPath,"
00133                                 "outputPath, jobPrio, nbCpus, jobWorkingDir, status, submitDate, endDate, owner,"
00134                                 "jobQueue,wallClockLimit, groupName, jobDescription, memLimit, nbNodes, "
00135                                 "nbNodesAndCpuPerNode from job, vsession "
00136                                 "where vsession.numsessionid=job.vsession_numsessionid"
00137                                 " and status > 0 and job.submitMachineId='"+mmachineId+"'";
00138 
00139     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00140     std::vector<std::string> results;
00141 
00142     TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00143     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListJobs();
00144 
00145     msessionServer.check();
00146 
00147     processOptions(mparameters, sqlListOfJobs);
00148     sqlListOfJobs.append(" order by submitDate");
00149 
00150     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListOfJobs (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfJobs.c_str()));
00151     long nbRunningJobs = 0;
00152     long nbWaitingJobs = 0;
00153     int jobStatus ;
00154     time_t submitDate;
00155     time_t endDate;
00156     if (ListOfJobs->getNbTuples() != 0){
00157       for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfJobs->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00158         results.clear();
00159         results = ListOfJobs->get(i);
00160         ii = results.begin();
00161 
00162         TMS_Data::Job_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createJob();
00163 
00164         job->setSessionId(*ii);
00165         job->setSubmitMachineId(*(++ii));
00166         job->setSubmitMachineName(*(++ii));
00167         job->setJobId(*(++ii));
00168         job->setJobName(*(++ii));
00169         job->setJobPath(*(++ii));
00170         job->setOutputPath(*(++ii));
00171         job->setErrorPath(*(++ii));
00172         job->setJobPrio(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00173         job->setNbCpus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00174         job->setJobWorkingDir(*(++ii));
00175         jobStatus = convertToInt(*(++ii));
00176         if(jobStatus==4) {
00177           nbRunningJobs++;
00178         } else if(jobStatus >= 1 && jobStatus <= 3) {
00179           nbWaitingJobs++;
00180         }
00181         job->setStatus(jobStatus);
00182         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00183         submitDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00184         job->setSubmitDate(submitDate);
00185         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00186         endDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00187         job->setEndDate(endDate);
00188         job->setOwner(*(++ii));
00189         job->setJobQueue(*(++ii));
00190         job->setWallClockLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00191         job->setGroupName(*(++ii));
00192         job->setJobDescription(*(++ii));
00193         job->setMemLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00194         job->setNbNodes(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00195         job->setNbNodesAndCpuPerNode(*(++ii)); 
00196 
00197         mlistObject->getJobs().push_back(job);
00198       }
00199       mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getJobs().size());
00200       mlistObject->setNbRunningJobs(nbRunningJobs);
00201       mlistObject->setNbWaitingJobs(nbWaitingJobs);
00202     } else {
00203 
00204     }
00205     return mlistObject;
00206   }
